name: Add a row in Google Sheets when a chat is finished in JivoChat
description: Every time a chat is finished in your JivoChat, Make will create new rows in your Google Sheets. In order for this scenario to work, the sheet should look like [this](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EaBgW3CGwl7SbXxFQnLFqMWb0lRHG942T5rYgOhsDOo/edit#gid=771664820).
